detachmentRule.name: Fervent Purgation
detachmentRule.lore: These warriors carry the fiery wrath of the Emperor into the darkest corners of this realm. Through the weapons of the faithful is the Master of Mankind’s immortal rage made manifest, with the holy trinity of bolgun, flamer and melta weapons as his servants, purging the Imperium’s worlds.
detachmentRule.description: Ranged weapons equipped by ADEPTA SORORITAS models from your army have the [ASSAULT] ability, and each time an attack made with such a weapon targets an enemy unit within 12", add 1 to the Strength characteristic of that attack.

enhacements.name: Righteous Rage
enhacements.lore: This servant of the divine draws deeply from their faith, enhancing their physical might.
enhacements.description: ADEPTA SORORITAS model only. Each time the bearer is selected to fight, you can first discard up to 3 Miracle dice. For each Miracle dice just discarded, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of the bearer’s melee weapons.

enhacements.name: Manual of Saint Griselda
enhacements.lore: Within this tome are the collected writings of Saint Griselda the Pious. The lessons inscribed on its vellum pages teach focus and decisiveness during times of war.
enhacements.description: ADEPTA SORORITAS model only. At the start of your Command phase, you can discard up to 2 Miracle dice. Then, add 1 Miracle dice to your Miracle Dice pool showing a value equal to the sum of the two Miracle dice you just discarded (to a maximum of 6).

enhacements.name: Fire and Fury
enhacements.lore: This warrior is a firebrand zealot without comparison. At their command, the faithful unleash relentless fire upon their chosen foe.
enhacements.description: ADEPTA SORORITAS model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of Torrent weapons equipped by models in that unit, and all other ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

enhacements.name: Iron Surplice of Saint Istaella
enhacements.lore: Worked upon by generations of artificers, consecrated with holy oils and steeped in the smoke of sacred incense, this suit of power armour is amongst the battle-proven relics held by the Orders Militant.
enhacements.description: CANONESS or PALATINE model only. The bearer has a Save characteristic of 2+ and the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

stratagems.name: shield of aversion
stratagems.lore: The Sisters of Battle gird themselves with the strength of their faith. It is a shield of repulsion that rejects the heretical cunning of their enemies.
stratagems.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: cleansing flames
stratagems.lore: Burn the mutant. Burn the heretic. Burn the witch.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, Torrent weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

stratagems.name: righteous blows
stratagems.lore: As the faithful strike their foes in righteous anger, they feel the Emperor's hand adding strength to their blows.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of attacks made by those weapons this phase, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model's unit must take a Battle-shock test.

stratagems.name: rites of fire
stratagems.lore: At close range, the Adepta Sororitas unleash the full devastating potential of their blessed weapons.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within 12" that is also within range of an objective marker, add 1 to the Wound roll. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model's unit must take a Battle-shock test.

stratagems.name: carry forth the faithful
stratagems.lore: Congregated within a transport, the Battle Sisters recite bellowing prayers so that the whole vehicle echoes to furious piety.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just before an ADEPTA SORORITAS TRANSPORT model from your army Advances.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, you can re-roll Advance rolls made for your TRANSPORT, and units can disembark from your TRANSPORT even though it Advanced. Units that do so count as having made a Normal move, and cannot declare a charge this turn.

stratagems.name: blazing ire
stratagems.lore: The transports of the Adepta Sororitas are mobile shrines. The Sisters within this vehicle recite psalms of righteous hatred and destruction before emerging to obliterate their foes.
stratagems.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS TRANSPORT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effect: One unit embarked within your TRANSPORT can disembark as if it were your Movement phase, and can then shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.
